project.title: British Values in the Workplace
project.description: This interactive e-learning course explores the key British values and their importance in a professional environment. Through practical scenarios, drag-and-drop activities, and reflective exercises, learners will develop an understanding of respect, tolerance, fairness, and the rule of law in the workplace. By the end of the course, participants will be able to recognise and apply these values to create a positive, inclusive, and collaborative work culture.
